DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the different types of osmotic dysregulation in patients with Syndrome of Inappropriate ADH (SIADH) and, hence, to analyze the pathophysiology of SIADH. These types will be characterized by measurement of AVP and copeptin while performing an osmotic stimulation with infusion of hypertonic saline.
DOC.brief_title: Subclassification of the Syndrome of Inappropriate ADH Secretion
DOC.criteria: age > 18 years, hyponatremia < 132 mmol/L SIADH age < 18 years cerebral metastases serum sodium > 132mmol/L
